Lyric:
[by:日向时雨]
[ti:Memories]
[ar:FREAKPASS ]
[al:Memories]
[by:日向时雨]
[00:32.68]You made your mark inside my head
[00:37.42]I won't forget the things you said
[00:41.13]We are too young
[00:42.59]We were so young
[00:45.01]We should have known better

[00:49.03]Nothing will ever change our minds
[00:52.62]Cover your eyes and shut the lights
[00:55.84]Just take my hands
[00:58.05]Let’s take a chance
[01:00.10]Ignite the sparks forever

[01:02.47]We are taking control of our lives
[01:06.78]Tonight we’re flying high
[01:10.30]We’ll keep running through all the stoplights
[01:14.51]All will be fine in time

[01:17.02](We run)

[01:18.77]No one can stop us
[01:24.14]Memories will guide us through this haze
[01:27.36]To better days
[01:29.21]A better place
[01:32.35]Oh

[02:07.79]Now there is nothing in our way
[02:11.10]Let stars guide us to better days
[02:14.93]Forever one
[02:16.62]Forever young
[02:18.82]We will have known better

[02:22.61]Now that we'll never be apart
[02:26.12]Don't be afraid open your heart
[02:29.93]Just take my hands
[02:31.94]Let’s take a chance
[02:33.79]Ignite the sparks forever

[02:36.95]We are taking control of our lives
[02:40.26]Tonight we’re flying high
[02:44.22]We’ll keep running through all the stoplights
[02:47.64]All will be fine in time

[02:50.69](We run)

[02:52.23]No one can stop us
[02:57.64]Memories will guide us through this haze
[03:01.09]To better days
[03:02.64]A better place
[03:06.07]Oh
